attributes.title: One of the worst apps ever
attributes.review: Horrible, horrible app takes forever to load and it doesn’t even work sometimes.

attributes.title: DUMP TRUMP 2020
attributes.review: Horrible horrible horrible only download to give a bad review so we don’t get tiktok banned and the app itself is actually bad it has so many glitches and bugs

attributes.title: ✨Melania Trump✨
attributes.review: This is a 1 start because it took a day for it to download and it’s been glitching a lot and it’s really not a good app cause Donald trump won’t even see it so that’s why it’s a one star

attributes.title: Horrible app DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😾😾😡
attributes.review: This app was really horrible it does not work at all 😾😾😡😡It caused a virus because of the Cheeto that appeared on my screen😾😾😡😡😡The worst app 😾😾😾😿It also scared me half to death when the 🍊 appeared on my screen 😾😾😿😔

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Whatever you do, don’t download this app. It makes your phone lag and glitch so bad I had to get a new phone. This app is just terrible overall. Don’t download

attributes.title: Not user friendly
attributes.review: 0/10 experience worst app one could possibly use. I will immediately delete this app 0/7 stars.

attributes.title: BAD bad app
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible.   so many glitches and bugs.  decided it would be better to just delete it.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Every time I open this app country music would start play I would never recommend this app to anyone

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app took a lot of storage from my phone and installed a virus. It didn’t end there it then began to not let me uninstall it. Do not download it just a heads up.

attributes.title: Scary
attributes.review:
Scary app with no warnings! As soon as I opened the app there was a picture of Trump. Needless to say I was not prepared, I screamed in horror and threw my phone away. 
Put a warning and maybe then I could give the app 2 stars
